15459.en: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Vill-Village King...! You're back!?<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15459.ja: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「そ　村王……！　お戻りか！？<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15459.ko: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 초, 촌왕님……! 돌아오셨습니까!?<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15459.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>村……村王！您回来了？<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15459.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>村、村王……！您回來了！？<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15460.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>No, it was <pc>, hmm... Sorry for surprising
you. However, it's a good thing you came.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15460.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「いや　<pc>だったか……。
　おどろかせて　すまなかった。
　だが　いいところに来てくれたな。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15460.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 이런, {pc}|hpp(이었나,였나)…….
　놀라게 해서 미안하다.
　하지만 마침 잘 왔다.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15460.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>啊，是<pc>吗……
吓到你了，抱歉。
你来得正好。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15460.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>啊，原來是<pc>啊……
嚇到你了，抱歉。
不過你來得正好。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15461.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>To be frank, Village King Cliffgain went to search
Snowy Mountain for the villagers who are late in
returning and hasn't came back himself.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15461.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「じつは　村王クリフゲーンさまが
　帰りの遅い村人を探しに
　雪山に行ったまま　戻ってこないのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15461.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 실은 촌왕 클리프겐 님께서
　귀가가 늦어진 마을 사람을 찾으러
　설산에 가셨는데 아직 돌아오지 않으셨다.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15461.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>其实，村王克里夫肯大人
去雪山找晚归的村民，
之后就再也没回来。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15461.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>其實，村王克里夫耿大人
去雪山找晚歸的村民，
之後就再也沒回來了。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15462.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>I'm mistaken, hmm... You are a traveler, right.
Hmm, your name is <pc>, is it.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15462.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「ちがったか……。お前は　旅の者だな。
　ふむ。<pc>というのか。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15462.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 아니었나……. 넌 여행자로군.
　흠, {pc}|hpp(이란,란) 말이지.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15462.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>不是村王啊……你是旅行者。
嗯，你名叫<pc>呀。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15462.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>不是村王……你是旅行者吧。
嗯，叫<pc>呀。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15463.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>To be frank, Village King Cliffgain went to search
Snowy Mountain for the villagers who are late in
returning and hasn't came back himself.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15463.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「じつは　このランガーオ村の村王である
　クリフゲーンさまが　帰りの遅い村人を探しに
　雪山に行ったまま　戻ってこないのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15463.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 실은 랑가오 마을의 촌왕이신 클리프겐 님께서
　귀가가 늦어진 마을 사람을 찾으러
　설산에 가셨는데 아직 돌아오지 않으셨다.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15463.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>其实，我们兰加奥村的村王克里夫肯大人
去雪山找晚归的村民，
之后就再也没回来。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15463.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>其實，我們蘭加奧村的村王克里夫耿大人
去雪山找晚歸的村民，
之後就再也沒回來了。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15464.en: <start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>The Village King went looking for my father!<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15464.ja: <start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>「村王は　お父さんを　探しにいったの！<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15464.ko: <start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>: 촌왕님은 저희 아빠를 찾으러 가셨어요!<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15464.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>村王去找我爸爸了！<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15464.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>村王去找我爸爸了！<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15465.en:
<start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>I said, ''Dad hasn't come home.'' and he told me,
''I'll bring him right back, so don't you worry and sit
tight, GAHAHA''...<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15465.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>「お父さんが帰ってこないのって　私が言ったら
　すぐに連れ戻してくるから　お前は
　心配しないで待ってろ　ガハハって……。<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15465.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>: 아빠가 돌아오지 않는다고 말씀드렸더니
　호탕하게 웃으시면서
　바로 데려올 테니 걱정 말라고…….<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15465.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>我说爸爸还没回家，
村王就笑着说马上把他带回来。
让我别担心，在这里等他们……<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15465.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>我說爸爸還沒回家，
村王就笑著說會馬上把他帶回來。
讓我別擔心，在這裡等他們……<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15466.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>When villagers haven't returned from Snowy Mountain,
it's common for the Village King to go in search of
them, but this is first he's taken so long to return.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15466.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「村の者が　雪山から戻らないときに
　村王が捜索に行くのは　よくあることだが
　これほど帰りが遅いのは　はじめてなのだ。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15466.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 마을 사람이 설산에서 돌아오지 않을 때면
　촌왕님께서 직접 찾으러 가시는 일이 종종
　있긴 하지만 이렇게 늦으신 적은 처음이다.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15466.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>村民登雪山后迟迟没有回来时，
村王经常上山去找，
但从来没这么晚还不回来。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15466.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>當村民去了雪山卻遲遲沒回來時，
村王經常會上山去找人，
但從沒這麼晚還不回來。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15467.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>I hate to think it, but... Something may have happened
to the Village King. Excuse me, but you wouldn't mind
going to Snowy Mountain to find the Village King!?<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15467.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「考えたくはないが……　村王の身に
　何か　あったのかもしれん。すまないが
　村王を探しに　雪山に行ってくれないか！？<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15467.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 설마 그럴 린 없겠지만…… 촌왕님께
　무슨 일이 생긴 걸지도 몰라. 미안하지만
　촌왕님을 찾으러 설산에 가 주겠나!?<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15467.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>虽然不愿意这样想……
但村王可能遇到什么意外了。
不好意思，你能去雪山帮我们找到他吗？<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15467.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>雖然不願意這樣想……
但村王可能遇到什麼意外了。
不好意思，你能去雪山幫我們找村王嗎！？<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15468.en: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Ooh, really! I'm in your debt!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15468.ja: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「おおっ　本当か！　恩に着るぞ！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15468.ko: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 오오, 정말이냐!? 고맙다!<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15468.zh-Hans: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>噢，真的吗！感激不尽！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15468.zh-Hant: <start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>喔喔，真的嗎！感激不盡！<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15469.en:
<start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>Dad said he was going to Ragi Snowfield today.
To gather things to sell in town, he said...<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15469.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>「お父さんは　今日は
　ラギ雪原の方に行くって　言ってました。
　町で売れる素材を　採るんだって……。<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15469.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>: 아빠는 오늘
　라기 설원으로 간다고 했어요.
　마을에서 팔 소재를 찾겠다면서요…….<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15469.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>爸爸说今天要去拉纪雪原那边，
收集些原料到镇上去卖……<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15469.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>爸爸說
今天要去洛紀雪原那邊，
收集些材料到鎮上去賣……<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15470.en:
<start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>I told the Village King that too, so if you head that
way, I'm sure you oughta find them both!<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15470.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>「村王にも　そう伝えたから
　そっちの方に行けば
　きっと　ふたりに　会えるはずです！<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15470.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>: 촌왕님께도 그렇게 말씀드렸으니
　그쪽으로 가면
　두 분을 찾으실 수 있을 거예요!<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15470.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>我也是这么告诉村王的，
所以去那边找的话，
肯定能见到他们俩！<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15470.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00113 _normal m00001>我也是這麼告訴村王的，
所以只要去那邊找，
肯定能見到他們倆！<stop_lip_animation n00113 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15476.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Ooh, really! I'm in your debt!
...Is what I'd like to say, but it seems you
have too many requests to do right now.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15476.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「おおっ　恩に着るぞ……と言いたいところだが
　どうやら　今は　頼まれごとが
　いっぱいのようだな……。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15476.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 오오, 고맙다……라고 하고 싶지만
　보아하니 지금은
　부탁받은 일이 많은 것 같군…….<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15476.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>噢噢，感激不尽……
但是你现在好像还有很多
其他任务要做呢……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15476.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>喔喔，感激不盡……雖然我很想這麼說，
但你現在好像還有很多
委託的事要處理……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15477.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>I can't force you to do it, but this is urgent too.
When you're free, I'd like you to listen to
my request.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15477.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「無理強いはできんが　こちらも急を要する。
　できるなら　手を空けてきて
　私の頼みを　聞いてほしいところだ。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15477.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 힘들면 어쩔 수 없지만 지금은 한시가 급해.
　가능하면 짬을 내서 내 부탁을 들어다오.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15477.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>我不强迫你，只是此事紧急。
可以的话，希望你腾出时间后，
再来接受我的委托。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15477.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>我不強迫你，只是此事緊急。
可以的話，希望你騰出時間後，
再來承接我的委託。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15478.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>I-I see... If that's how it is, then I can do nothing
but pray to Heaven for the Village King's safe
return...<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15478.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「そ　そうか……。
　こうなったら　村王が　無事に戻られることを
　天に祈るよりほかにないな……。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15478.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 그, 그래…….
　그렇다면 촌왕님께서 무사히 돌아오시길
　하늘에 비는 수밖에 없겠군…….<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15478.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>是……是吗……
这样的话，我们只能向上天祈祷
村王他们能够平安归来了……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15478.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>是、是嗎……
這樣的話，我們只能向上天祈禱
村王他們能夠平安歸來了……<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15471.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Ragi Snowfield is a severe snowfield just north of
the eastern edge of the Rangao Mountains. If you go
there, take this with you.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15471.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「ラギ雪原は　ランガーオ山地の東端から
　北へ抜けた所にある　厳しい雪原だ。
　そこへ行くなら　これを持っていってくれ。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15471.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 라기 설원은 랑가오 산지 동쪽 끝에서
　북쪽으로 가면 나오는 험난한 설원이다.
　거기 갈 생각이라면 이걸 가져가라.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15471.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>拉纪雪原在兰加奥山地东端以北的地方。
是寒冷难耐的雪原。
去那里的话，还是拿上这个吧。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15471.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>洛紀雪原在蘭加奧山地東端以北的地方。
是寒冷難耐的雪原。
如果是要去那裡，還是帶上這個吧。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001512.ja:
<pc>は
ヌーク草（だいじなもの）を　手に入れた！<me 60>
19001512.zh-Hans:
<pc>获得了
暖暖草（重要物品）！<me 60>
19001512.zh-Hant:
<pc>獲得了
暖暖草（重要物品）！<me 60>

15473.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>That's a kind of medicinal herb that warms up one's
body to keep from losing one's strength in the
Snowy Mountains.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15473.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「それは　雪山で体力をうばわれぬよう
　身体を　あたためるための　薬草の一種だ。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15473.ko:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>: 그건 설산에서 체력을 온존할 수 있도록
　몸을 덥혀 주는 약초의 일종이다.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15473.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>这是有驱寒作用的药草，
能在雪山上保持你的体力不被严寒消耗。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15473.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>這是有驅寒作用的藥草，
能在雪山上保持你的體力不被嚴寒消耗。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15474.en:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>Supposing the Village King or Fuumi's father have
succumbed to the cold, give them that to eat. I'm
counting on you.<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15474.ja:
<start_lip_sync n00121 _normal m00001>「もしも　村王や　フウミの父親が
　寒さで弱っていたら　それを食べさせてくれ。
　よろしく頼んだぞ。<stop_lip_animation n00121 CLOSE_MOUTH>
15474.ko:
